1_1GfuoDDteKVHH6Jk6hnFQwo6TTTAmEe8hn.body:
> [laughingjunkie](#comment_2_13uKYMY82QL2kgMeoSyh7mQVgPL5LcJbyu): You're kind of retarded. In order for your own system to actually function to any degree, you would require an actual hierarchy or governing body of some sort to ensure efficiency. A system cannot run itself as it's too easily derailed from it's purpose. This is true of any societal system. That you worship the words of a kike who had no previous experience or knowledge in economics, and never held a government position, says a lot about how unreliable anything you say actually is. Any society will develop it's own economy. But hating those that won't give away their own work for free is the sentiment of a man with nothing to contribute himself. You wallow in envy while denying the sins of your predecessors as 'not true socialism/communism' because they failed. Even with Venezuela, you bellends still deny it for what it is. For someone who pretends to be so smart, you don't seem know very much of your own ideology, and where and how it actually originated.

there you are, ya tiny brave keyboard warrior neo nazi, talking shit about jews. I thought you rump lickers are supposed to target muslims nowadays. GTFO
